title: Golang HTTP Request Handling
description: This lab aims to test your ability to use the net/http package in Golang to issue HTTP requests.

meta.title: Go HTTP Client | Golang Programming Tutorials
meta.description: Learn how to use the Golang net/http package to issue HTTP requests and handle responses effectively in your Go programs.
meta.keywords: Go, Golang, HTTP Client, net/http, Programming Tutorials
